summary: UI button not responsive on mobile
description: When clicking the main submit button on the login page on a mobile device, there is no visual feedback or action.
The checkout API endpoint /api/checkout fails with a 500 Internal Server Error when processing a payment.
After uploading a new profile picture, the old one is still displayed. Caching issue?
Sales tax is being calculated at 5% instead of the required 7% for California.
The main headline on the homepage has a spelling mistake.
